mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_building_resource( pid, resource_path, big_type, sm_type, is_first, resource_name, resource_alias, resource_detail, create_time, update_time
) VALUES ( #{entity.pid}, #{entity.resource_path}, #{entity.big_type}, #{entity.sm_type}, #{entity.is_first}, #{entity.resource_name}, #{entity.resource_alias}, #{entity.resource_detail}, now(), now() )
